title: Verify a Claim Payment was Sent
description: A life insurance beneficiary is calling to check if their claim payment has been mailed.

tasks.description: Identify the beneficiary and the associated claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct claim file.

tasks.description: Check the payment system for the status of the claim check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the check was printed and mailed two days ago.

tasks.description: Inform the beneficiary that the check has been sent and provide the check number and mailing date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear update and supporting details to the beneficiary.
